data.data: Here at ACM@CMU, we're proud of everything we do, and that is only possible with our amazing board members. Get to know our team.
My name is Jasmine and I am a sophomore in SCS. I'm interested in Robotics. I dance on CMU's Bhangra team and like to cook.
Hey There! I am Harshal, a grad student studying Information Security at CMU. I am a big fan of Marvel & DC movies/comics. In my free time I love playing tennis or badminton.

Hi! My name is Olivia, and I am a sophomore studying Computer Science. Outside of classes, I like to bike and play the piano. I also enjoy travelling to new places while getting to experience different foods and cultures!
Hi I'm Audrey and I'm a sohpmore in scs. Ask me about my birds!!

Hey! I'm a sophomore studying HCI and Art. I primarily specialize in making Virtual Reality experiences. When not working on college stuff, I like to collaborate on fun side projects with friends and learn new skills!
Hi! I'm Isaac and I'm a Junior in Physics, and I'm starting to do research in Astrophysics. You can also catch me cooking, playing music, or cleaning forgotten closets in Gates.

I'm a CS major, Math minor, and maybe a Linguistics minor. I like working out and becoming swole, baking+cooking+cutting fruit, knitting+crocheting, and dabbing. Fun fact - I can whip meringue by hand!
I'm Dennis, a sophomore studying Information Systems and Computer Science. On any given day, you can find me coding, biking, and listening to jazz.

Hi, I'm Misha! I'm a Junior in Computer Science in the Theory Concentration. I love being a TA for various classes in the CS department and writing math problems for the CMU high school math competition, CMIMC. You'll also find me in the pool and the volleyball court during the warmer months.
